titleStmt.title: The questions propounded to Mr. Herbert the Kings Attorney Generall, by the House of Commons in the presence of both Houses of Parliament, on Friday the fourteenth of Ianuary 1641. Together with the answer of the said Mr. Herbert to the said questions, concerning the impeachment of the Lord Kimbolton, and Mr. Hollis, &c. Members of the House of Commons. Also the articles against the Lord Kimbolton, Mr. Hollis, and the rest. And lastly, his Majesties two messages to the Houses of Parliament, to repaire the late breaches of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
Herbert, Edward, 1591?-1657.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
